nodes.text: Anx Minor was an astronomical object located in the Anx Minor system, a part of the Raioballo sector in the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It was situated on the hyperlane known as the Veragi Trade Route, which connected it to the Sinsang system as well as the Ord Trasi system in the Relgim sector. Another hyperspace route connected Anx Minor to Gravlex Med, the homeworld of the sentient Anx species that at one point colonized neighboring star systems in the Anx Space region.

Anx Minor was situated in the territory of the Pentastar Alignment between 4 ABY and 12 ABY, when that faction was absorbed by the Imperial Remnant. The celestial body remained within the borders of the Imperial Remnant until 17 ABY. That year, following a victory at Ketaris, forces commanded by New Republic Admiral Gial Ackbar triumphed over a force led by Admiral Gilad Pellaeon of the Imperial Remnant in a confrontation at Anx Minor.

Anx Minor was first mentioned in the 2002 reference book The New Essential Guide to Characters, written by Daniel Wallace. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed Anx Minor in grid square L-4.
